[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=777383][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/headlines-hacker.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Game Tab Bytes Bonus[/color][/b]
Now receive double Bytes for all the Threads/Posts you post under Gaming Tab. Get the Bytes while you can. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5991020]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]HF Questionnaire[/color][/b]
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#9999FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url] has created a short and straightforward Questionnaire to collect feedback about the recent changes on Hack Forums. Go and give your precious feedback. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5992255]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]HF Email Alias Forwards[/color][/b]
Hack Forums email alias forwards for [b][color=#0066FF]Ub3r[/color][/b] members is active again. Kindly check the dedicated thread to revive your email forwarder. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5992227]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Best Response Feature[/color][/b]
An essential feature has been added to the postbit in several sections of the site for Moderators, Mentors, Staff, and Admins to mark a specific post as "Best Response." The poster will be rewarded with 10 β, and it will encourage other members to help the community. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5992503]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Favorite Nav Item[/color][/b]
A poll has been created by [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#9999FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url] to know your favorite Navigation Item. However, 'Favorites' is a new addition to the menu to browse only those forums which you visit the most; rest is self-explanatory. Go, vote, and make a wise choice! [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5993857]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]News Discord Connecting and Account Security[/color][/b]
The Discord social login has been removed tentatively due to an exploit, allowing users to login without any credentials. Whoever registered through Discord, and didn't create a password may get their accounts locked and have to register again. [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#9999FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url] is trying to patch the exploit via Reverse Engineering; till then, this social login will remain suspended until further notice. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5993892]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Announcements[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5990999][color=#FFFFFF]HackForums Email Forwards[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
Omniscient has decided that he will be bringing back email accounts for UB3R members. The accounts are currently in the works but should be ready very soon.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5992255][color=#FFFFFF]HF Questionnaire[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
Omniscient is looking for feedback about the website, all submissions are anonymous.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5992503][color=#FFFFFF]Best Response Feature[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
A new feature has been added for Moderators, Mentors, Staff and Admins. It allows them to give you 10 bytes (This could change in the future.) and add the best response button to the top of the thread, clicking the icon will forward you towards the post that has been marked as the best response.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Informational Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5991352][color=#FFFFFF]World British tanker stolen.[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3525782][color=#FFCC00][b]HF.Psych[/b][/color][/url]
Iranian militants have stolen a British tank. Donald Trump has offered to support for the UK.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5993531][color=#FFFFFF]BTC-E Prosecution[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
The BTC-E owner has been arrested due to Failing to register it as a money transmitter.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5991463][color=#FFFFFF][Follow along] Growing an Instagram automatically??[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1729678][color=#EC7E03][b]ScreemS[/b][/color][/url]
ScreemS has set up an Instagram account and its got no personal work done to it apart from setting the account up the rest of it is just bots handling the account.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Entertaining Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5990994][color=#FFFFFF]My self improvement journey[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=4217914][color=#FFFFFF][b]debian[/b][/color][/url]
debian is trying to improve his life and has explained how far he has come from the past year of work he has put in so far.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5985961][color=#FFFFFF]Would you be able to live without electronics?[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3074736][color=#FFFFFF][b]Sunniebeta[/b][/color][/url]
If you lived in a world with electronics one day, and then the next there was no such thing would you be able to carry on?

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5990430][color=#FFFFFF]Lil Nas X Overrated[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
Omniscient has expressed his feelings about Lil Nas and thinks they are overrated, But he wants to know if he is right in thinking this way.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5991227][color=#FFFFFF]How did you make your first money online?[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2589435][color=#2D7E52][b]Mr Professor[/b][/color][/url]
Mr Professor has made a thread sharing how he made his first bit of money from doing online work, and many have followed his footsteps in his thread.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Contests & Giveaways[/b][/color]

[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5991122][color=#FFFFFF]2.5K Bytes Contest | 1 Winner.[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3446221][color=#EC7E03][b]Banter.[/b][/color][/url]
The user known as Banter. Is hosting a giveaway with 2.5k bytes up for grabs but only one winner, the contest ends on the 1st of august. Good luck!

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5993350][color=#FFFFFF]1 x 6 Month L33T Upgrade[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3188621][color=#0066FF][b]Dyrr[/b][/color][/url]
Are you feeling lucky? Want to get yourself L33t but cant afford it yet, then make sure you check out Dyrr's giveaway for a chance to get L33T for free.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5991585][color=#FFFFFF]Win 100 bytes daily! Unlimited entries - Post to win[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2028907][color=#2D7E52][b]Lavish Living[/b][/color][/url]
Lavish is hosting a daily giveaway of 100 bytes for everyone to enter. You can enter as many times as you like so get posting.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5993597][color=#FFFFFF]$50 BTC || Sponsored by #PROJECTINSECURITY[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=4315025][color=#FFFFFF][b]myg0t_Andrew[/b][/color][/url]
The member myg0t_Andrew is hosting a giveaway worth $50 BTC. The Giveaway ends on 15th of August.
[/list]

[align=center][i]Want to showcase your own Battlestation (Computer Setup)? [url=https://hackforums.net/private.php?action=send&uid=561239&subject=HFN%20Battlestation&message=Here%20are%20images%20of%20my%20battlestation:%20]Submit yours now![/url][/i][/align]

[color=transparent]         [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2890436][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/trends-pikachu.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]IT Chapter Two Final Trailer Released[/color][/b] 
The final trailer for the second chapter of the IT remake was released, and it looks pretty good. The movie takes place 27 years after the events of the first movie. Pennywise returns with a vengeance. The kids from the last movie are all grown up adults who realize they never killed Pennywise, and they vowed to stop him if he ever returns. The film will hit the theaters on September 6, 2019. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xhJ5P7Up3jA]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Top Gun: Maverick Trailer Released[/color][/b] 
Paramount Pictures has uploaded the official new trailer for the up coming movie Top Gun: Maverick. Once again, Tom Cruise will once again play the role of Captain Pete "Maverick" Mitchell for yet another action packed military aviation movie. From the looks of it, it seems like this movie will be pretty good. The new movie will be released in theaters sometime in 2020. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qSqVVswa420]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]What Happens If One Million People Actually Storm Area 51[/color][/b] 
One of the most recent trending memes of this month involves a Facebook event hosted by "shitposting cause im in shambles." The event is something I'm sure everyone has heard by now is "Storm Area 51, they can't stop all of us," which started as just a meme troll event has gone wildly viral. The event page also mentions, "if we Naruto run we can run faster than their bullets," which is an obvious indication that this event is not to be taken seriously. But lately many people have been taking this event seriously, so much so that it has managed to make its way into the mainstream media. The YouTube channel known as "What If" has uploaded a video scenario explaining what would happen if one million people actually did storm Area 51. For one, the closest airport to Area 51 would be in Vegas, and from there its a few hours into the middle of the desert to reach the base. There are no highways that lead to it, its all mostly dirt roads and 2-way streets. The streets would be beyond packed with traffic, and most people wouldn't even make it to the site. But what if they did manage to make it and did manage to storm Area 51? Check out the video to find out just what would happen if this actually went down.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dxqYDrELD_E]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]The Most Powerful Smartphone In The World[/color][/b] 
The YouTube channel Unbox Therapy is showing off what can possibly be "the most powerful smartphone in the world." From the looks of the video, not only does he unbox the phone itself, but a bunch of other accessories for it as well. The phone came with a cooling unit that you can attach to it to cool your phone down whenever you're doing some heavy gaming. The accessories for this phone are pretty amazing, docking stations, game controllers and a whole lot of other cool things for it. I would love to get one of these for myself, I mean who wouldn't? [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q3eFXeO62oo]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Asian Nations Reject Western Trash | The Daily Show[/color][/b] 
This clip of the daily show is trending, letting everyone know about the trash/recycling "process" that really goes on here in America. Whenever you recycle your plastics, it doesn't get recycled in a facility, what used to happen was America would ship the plastics over to countries like China and Cambodia, until one day they decided they didn't want the Americans trash anymore, and they sent everything back. Trevor Noah explains this situation all too well and its hilarious. At the same time its pretty sad because there isn't anything we can do about all that plastic waste. It's all just going to keep build up until they can figure something out.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-htnUTN4mH0]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Zombieland: Double Tap Trailer Official Trailer[/color][/b] 
There is a new Zombieland movie coming soon, and the trailer for it looks great! From the looks of it they end up taking over the white house. The original cast from the first movie will be in this new one along with some new faces. I'm hoping this movie is just as good as the first one and not a disappointment. This is definitely one movie i wanna go watch on he big screen. The movie comes out in theaters on October 18 of this year. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZlW9yhUKlkQ]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]
